title: Kids Recipes for Christmas: Make Them Feel Special During the Holiday
description: We all love our kids, but we also need to show them time to time that how much they mean to us and there is nothing more special you can do than creating a custom made menu dedicated to the kids during the holidays! Gifts are, of course, a big part of the holidays but food can also serve as a great way to show your love to them. This book contains 30 fantastic Christmas recipes that are guaranteed to be loved by your kids. Of course, there are an exception, but in general, most kids should love these recipes because of their creativity and appearance. When your food looks good, kids tend to go towards it more. Try these recipes and serve them on your table in a way that appeals to your kids.
author: Stephanie Sharp
